trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供事件資料中的參數物件當做使用<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref>根的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會公開為`e`中的參數<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>顯示新的檢視，使用者按一下並拖曳圖表區域中的結果之前，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>之後建立新的檢視時，會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: 請務必注意位置和檢視的大小不能設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>事件因為已在此情況下建立檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: ViewEventArgs 類別包含下列屬性:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>屬性，用來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>檢視所顯示的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>屬性會取得圖表區域的名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 也可以設定其他圖表區域屬性。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>屬性，用來取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>與檢視相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷類型的座標軸，它可以是 X，Y，X2 或 Y2，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 也可以設定其他軸屬性。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>屬性，代表新檢視的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>屬性，代表新檢視的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>屬性，表示檢視的大小度量單位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體類別具有指定 axis 和 newPosition 參數。

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數 檢視的軸。

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 新的小數位數檢視開始位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體類別具有指定 axis ， newPosition ， newSize 和 newSizeType 參數。

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數 檢視的軸。

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 新的小數位數檢視開始位置。

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: 新的標尺檢視大小。

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 檢視新的標尺大小的度量單位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref>檢視所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可以用來:-決定軸類型 — X，X2，Y 或 Y2 — 的事件被引發時，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -取得並設定軸屬性，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref>代表軸檢視所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>檢視所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>屬性可以用來決定圖表區域檢視，藉由存取所屬<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可用來取得及設定圖表區域屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref>表示圖表區域檢視所屬的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得沿著軸檢視的新位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>根的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>物件，並表示檢視的新位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition 屬性可以設定新的值以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件，但不能設定為新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>事件因為已在此情況下建立檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition 一律會以座標軸數值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>表示的垂直檢視的下方或水平檢視的左方的位置軸檢視位置的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定檢視，以沿著軸的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，表示沿著軸檢視的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: 大小是為垂直檢視的高度或寬度的水平檢視。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: 取得檢視的新大小度量單位。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>的度量單位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>屬性由自動決定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項，並將數字或一天。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: 請記得，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>屬性一律會以座標軸數值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您明確設定大小的型別，如果類型符合所屬的捲軸的軸。

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，未指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>如果座標軸未使用<xref:System.DateTime>值。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>屬性可以設定新的值以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件，但不能設定為新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>事件因為已建立檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>列舉值，表示的度量單位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>屬性，代表寬度或高度的資料檢視。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>。
